---
This game is made for the 3rd BTP game jam in seven days.

Play as a guy whose touch turns stuff into dust! Avoid colliding with enemies by jumping from lily pad to lily pad. If you hit one, a lily pad disappears.

There was once a guy who lived a peaceful life in a village. But one night, the unexpected happened! His body started glowing. From that day on whatever he touched turned into dust, never to be seen by anyone again. Everyone started fearing him, and he had to run away! he travelled day and night through different biomes to find a place to live free from fear. He ended up in a pond. He tried crossing it, but the creatures there started attacking him. He didn't want to kill them and tried to stay away by jumping from lily pad to lily pad.

Click on a lily pad to move there. Avoid colliding with the enemies at all costs. If you do, a random lily pad will disappear. Survive for the longest time.
